Gordon -- well put.  I tend to believe that a big part of the problem 
is t=
hat so few of us have venues to learn in person that the reliance 
on books=
 overshadows the fact that you cannot learn to recognize the 
nuances of ha=
taraki from pictures.  The details are learned by hands on 
study (OK -- th=
at's loosely put LOL) and need guidance from those with 
great experience. =
 To paraphrase what you said, get thee to a good show 
or study group as of=
ten as possible.  
PS:  The same goes for the study of tosogu.
